text: Hi there  I got the amaze and Citi rewards.1. Came to Realise there is one percent charge after minimum $1000 spending. Is this a new update  or is this something that is previously known ?2. There is a 50 Cent charge for every small charge also  but they put it as 1%. is it still worth it to use this on a daily basis as it city point+insta points afterwards?
It has been there for many months. Minimum 50 cents charge. Only for local spend. And CRMC don't give bonus rewards after 1k also anyway.
no  only bonus saver credit/debit card counted
Instapoints are earned only on foreign currency iirc. And the 1% charge is only for local spends. So it’s not possible for them to coincide
buy online/offline? how much? which merchant? do a search on heymax/minstant.

Hi guys  if I exceed $1000 local spend on my amaze+crmc and was charged 1%. If I use my amaze+uob lady to spend locally  will I get charged  1% again. Thanks

Not much reason to use amaze + UOB lady locally. Unless you want to avoid DCC in Agoda.
